org.apache.paimon.utils

Class VectorMappingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.utils.VectorMappingUtils

  • public class VectorMappingUtils
extends Object
    This is a util about how to expand the ColumnVectors with the partition row and index mapping. For example, we fetch the column of a, b, c from orc file, but the schema of table is a, a1, a2, pt, b, a, b1, c Then we use `createPartitionMappedVectors` to fill to partition pt to a, b, c, the filled columns are a, pt, b, c After this, we use index mapping to expand to a, pt, b, c to a, a1(null), a2(null), pt, b, a, b1(null), c In this way, we don't need ProjectedRow to perform a per-record replace action.
